verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G5105><s%> seeing <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> are compassed <S%G4029>about<s%> <S%G2254>with<s%> so <S%G5118>great<s%> a <S%G3509>cloud<s%> of <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> let us lay <S%G659>aside<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3591>weight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G266>sin<s%> which doth so easily <S%G2139>beset<s%> us, <S%G2532>and<s%> let us <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G73>race<s%> that is set <S%G4295>before<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%>

Looking <S%G872><s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G747>author<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5051>finisher<s%> of our <S%G4102>faith;<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> that was set <S%G4295>before<s%> <S%G848>him<s%> <S%G5278>endured<s%> the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> <S%G2706>despising<s%> the <S%G152>shame,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> is set <S%G2523>down<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G357>consider<s%> him that <S%G5278>endured<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G485>contradiction<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G848>himself,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> ye be <S%G2577>wearied<s%> and <S%G1590>faint<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>minds.<s%>
Ye have not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G478>resisted<s%> <S%G3360>unto<s%> <S%G129>blood,<s%> <S%G464>striving<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G1585>forgotten<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1256>speaketh<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> unto <S%G5207>children,<s%> <S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G3643>despise<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> thou the <S%G3809>chastening<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1590>faint<s%> when thou art <S%G1651>rebuked<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> him: <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G25>loveth<s%> he <S%G3811>chasteneth,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3146>scourgeth<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G3858>receiveth.<s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> ye <S%G5278>endure<s%> <S%G3809>chastening,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4374>dealeth<s%> with <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> with <S%G5207>sons;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G3811>chasteneth<s%> <S%G3756>not?<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G2075>be<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3809>chastisement,<s%> <S%G3739>whereof<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1096>are<s%> <S%G3353>partakers,<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> ye <S%G3541>bastards,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5207>sons.<s%>

Furthermore <S%G1534><s%> we have <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> which <S%G3810>corrected<s%> us, <S%G2532>and<s%> we gave them <S%G1788>reverence:<s%> shall we <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> be in <S%G5293>subjection<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2198>live?<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> <S%G3303>verily<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3811>chastened<s%> us <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G1380>pleasure;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> our <S%G4851>profit,<s%> that we might be <S%G3335>partakers<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G41>holiness.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3809>chastening<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3918>present<s%> <S%G1380>seemeth<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G5479>joyous,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3077>grievous:<s%> <S%G1161>nevertheless<s%> <S%G5305>afterward<s%> it <S%G591>yieldeth<s%> the <S%G1516>peaceable<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> unto them which are <S%G1128>exercised<s%> <S%G1223>thereby.<s%> <S%G846><s%>
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> lift <S%G461>up<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> hang <S%G3935>down,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3886>feeble<s%> <S%G1119>knees;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3717>straight<s%> <S%G5163>paths<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> that which is <S%G5560>lame<s%> be turned out of the <S%G1624>way;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> let it <S%G3123>rather<s%> be <S%G2390>healed.<s%>

Follow <S%G1377><s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G38>holiness,<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> Lord: <S%G2962><s%>

Looking <S%G1983>diligently<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G5302>fail<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4491>root<s%> of <S%G4088>bitterness<s%> <S%G5453>springing<s%> <S%G507>up<s%> <S%G1776>trouble<s%> you, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>thereby<s%> <S%G5026><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> be <S%G3392>defiled;<s%>

Lest <S%G3361><s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4205>fornicator,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> profane <S%G952>person,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2269>Esau,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G473>for<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> morsel of <S%G1035>meat<s%> <S%G591>sold<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4415>birthright.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G2467>know<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3347>afterward,<s%> when he <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G2816>inherited<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2129>blessing,<s%> he was <S%G593>rejected:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance,<s%> <S%G2539>though<s%> he sought it <S%G1567>carefully<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1144>tears.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> ye are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4334>come<s%> unto the <S%G3735>mount<s%> that might be <S%G5584>touched,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G2545>burned<s%> with <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> unto <S%G1105>blackness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2366>tempest,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G2279>sound<s%> of a <S%G4536>trumpet,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4487>words;<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> voice they that <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3868>entreated<s%> that the <S%G3056>word<s%> should <S%G3361>not<s%> be spoken to them any <S%G4369>more:<s%> <S%G846><s%>

(For <S%G1063><s%> they could <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5342>endure<s%> that which was <S%G1291>commanded,<s%> And if so much <S%G2579>as<s%> a <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2345>touch<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> it shall be <S%G3036>stoned,<s%> or thrust <S%G2700>through<s%> with a dart: <S%G1002><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5398>terrible<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5324>sight,<s%> that <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> I exceedingly <S%G1510>fear<s%> <S%G1630><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> quake: <S%G1790>)<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> ye are come <S%G4334>unto<s%> <S%G3735>mount<s%> <S%G4622>Zion,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> unto the <S%G4172>city<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to an innumerable <S%G3461>company<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%>

To the general <S%G3831>assembly<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G4416>firstborn,<s%> which are <S%G583>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G2923>Judge<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of just <S%G1342>men<s%> made <S%G5048>perfect,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G3316>mediator<s%> of the <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G4473>sprinkling,<s%> that <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> better <S%G2909>things<s%> <S%G3844>than<s%> that of <S%G6>Abel.<s%>

See <S%G991><s%> that ye <S%G3868>refuse<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> him that <S%G2980>speaketh.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1565>they<s%> <S%G5343>escaped<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> who <S%G3868>refused<s%> him that <S%G5537>spake<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> shall not <S%G2249>we<s%> escape, if we turn away <S%G654>from<s%> <S%G3588>him<s%> that speaketh <S%G575>from<s%> heaven: <S%G3772><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G4531>shook<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> he hath <S%G1861>promised,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2089>Yet<s%> once <S%G530>more<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4579>shake<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> word, <S%G2089>Yet<s%> once <S%G530>more,<s%> <S%G1213>signifieth<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3331>removing<s%> of those things that are <S%G4531>shaken,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of things that are <S%G4160>made,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> those things which cannot be <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G3361><s%> may <S%G3306>remain.<s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> we <S%G3880>receiving<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom<s%> which cannot be <S%G761>moved,<s%> let us <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G1223>whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> we may <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2102>acceptably<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G127>reverence<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> godly fear: <S%G2124><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is a <S%G2654>consuming<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>
